title: Anyone remember that dance a riot employee mapped for an in-game character?
body:
I vaguely remember some time ago that a riot employee was the one who got hooked to map a dance for an in-game character.

Can anyone remember who and what champ it was? I've been trying to look it up but I cant seem to find it.

I believe it was Jinx? or some female champion who is not a yordle

Thank you

replies.body:
It was one of the hints & tips on loading screen.
"One of Ziggs' idle animations is based on a Rioters celebratory dance" or something like that.
